title: sikkadanele jANe
sahitya:
sikkidanele jANe shrI vENugOpAla bhaktavatsala dEvanu


anupallavi

  makkaLa caNDike marada konege kaTTi ghakkana cappALeyikki naliva namma


caraNam 1    heNNu makkaLu baccaloLageNNe hacci koNDu baNNa vastrava bicci 
battalire kaNNige bisi nIru celli sIreyanoidu unnatavAda vrSavanEri ihanamma
    caraNam 2    paTTe mancada mEle patiyante kuLLire eSTu svatantra ivage gOpi 
uTTa sIreyanOidu baTTa kucava piDivaneSTenda hELe bhraSTa mADidanamma
    caraNam 3    saDagaradi SODasha sahasra strIyara oDa gUDi koLalanUduta bandu 
kaDeve gOpiya jaDe piDideLave ennoDeya purandara viTTalarAyane
